verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Blessing and honor, glory and power newline be unto the Ancient of Days; newline From ev'ry nation, all of creation newline Bow before the Ancient of Days

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Ev'ry tongue in Heaven and earth newline shall declare Your glory, newline ev'ry knee will bow at your throne newline in wor-ship newline you will be exalted, O God, newline and your Kingdom shall not pass away newline O Ancient of Days

verse.name: b1
verse.lines: Your Kingdom shall reign over all the earth, newline sing unto the Ancient of Days newline For none can compare to Your matchless worth, newline sing unto the Ancient of Days

verse.name: o1
verse.lines: O Ancient of Days. O Ancient of Days.
